import React from 'react' import { Outlet, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from '../images/logo.webp' import { useStore } from '../store'; import { update_show_menu_bar } from './store/actions' import { UPDATE_SHOW_MENU_BAR } from '../store/constants'; const Header = ({ logout }) => { const [state, dispatch] = useStore() const { leftMenuBar } = state const toggleShowMenu = () =>{ dispatch(update_show_menu_bar(leftMenuBar)) console.log(leftMenuBar) } return (
Home Profile
Profile
) } export default Header
